text:
<optional title, max 6 words>

Dounia confronts Luzhin, tension rises.

Dounia: “This must end today, Pyotr Petrovitch.”  

Luzhin: “I can dislike your family, Dounia.”  

Dounia: “Don’t take offense! Be generous.”  

---  

Dounia: “I must choose between you two.”  

Luzhin: “You can’t be serious!”  

Dounia: “I need to know where I stand.”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Dounia insists that she must choose between her brother and her fiancé, Pyotr Petrovitch, to resolve their conflict.
